comment.body: Stupid Question - Can ZeroNet be used with any browser? I was thinking about trying out seamonkey http://www.seamonkey-project.org/

> [nofish](#comment_178_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): If it support modern features (websocket, sandboxed iframe), then it should work.

Thanks
I just found this on github about integrating a decentralized wordpress on zeronet. It sounds interesting. Is there any coders on zeronet who can pull it off. https://github.com/leoloso/PoP/issues/9
